column1: Built for families. Better for the planet.
The Packster2 70 simplifies everyday life — and it’s made from eco-friendly materials throughout.

column5: data-proportion=""true"" data-align=""none"" data-index=""0"" data-file-name=""Packster_Packster2_feature_built-for-families-better-for-the-planet.jpg"" data-file-size=""0"" data-origin="","" data-size="","" data-rotate="""" data-rotatex="""" data-rotatey="""" data-percentage=""auto,auto"">

column1: RX Connect takes your riding experience to a new level. You can completely secure your bike with the standard, integrated RX Chip and the RX Service to go along with it. Activate ConnectRide Free for one year free of charge: the RX Connect app shows the location of your bike, offers a digital motion alarm and automatically records rides with extensive riding statistics.

column5: data-proportion=""true"" data-align=""none"" data-index=""0"" data-file-name=""Packster_Packster2_feature_connected-e-bike.jpg"" data-file-size=""0"" data-origin="","" data-size="","" data-rotate="""" data-rotatex="""" data-rotatey="""" data-percentage=""auto,auto"">

column1: Effortless to ride. Easy to live with.

The Packster2 70 handles like a pro — smooth to steer, simple to park, and easy to hop on and off. Its cable steering lets you glide through tight spots, even fully loaded. Need more space? The rear carrier adds room for up to 27 kg of extra cargo.

column5: data-proportion=""true"" data-align=""none"" data-index=""0"" data-file-name=""Packster_Packster2_feature_effortless-to-ride-easy-to-live-with.jpg"" data-file-size=""0"" data-origin="","" data-size="","" data-rotate="""" data-rotatex="""" data-rotatey="""" data-percentage=""auto,auto"">

column1: The EPP transport box is fully recyclable and made with zero emissions. Optional child seats include five-point belts and side-impact protection for peace of mind. Add the buggy kit for easy access with half-height side walls — all within a tough frame that supports the weather cover and shields your passengers.

column5: data-proportion=""true"" data-align=""none"" data-index=""0"" data-file-name=""Packster_Packster2_feature_equipped-for-the-future.jpg"" data-file-size=""0"" data-origin="","" data-size="","" data-rotate="""" data-rotatex="""" data-rotatey="""" data-percentage=""auto,auto"">

column1: A powerful headlight with daytime running light and well-placed reflectors keeps you visible at all times. The optional Bosch ABS and Magura disc brakes add extra stopping power and control — preventing skids and slips, even in sudden stops.

column5: data-proportion=""true"" data-align=""none"" data-index=""0"" data-file-name=""Packster_Packster2_feature_see-clearly-stay-in-control.jpg"" data-file-size=""0"" data-origin="","" data-size="","" data-rotate="""" data-rotatex="""" data-rotatey="""" data-percentage=""auto,auto"">

column1: Additional Chain Lock with Vaude Bag – Extra security, neatly packed.

<div class=""card-description"">The 130 cm Abus chain lock pairs with the frame lock for added protection — tough 6 mm links that secure your bike to fixed objects or lock multiple bikes together. One key fits the frame, chain, and battery locks. The lock stows in a Vaude saddle bag made from 100% recycled polyester, with a roll-top design for quick, easy access.
Note: May limit saddle height on smaller frames.
Bosch eBike ABS 2.0 – Control when it counts.
Stay firmly in the saddle, even under hard braking. On asphalt or gravel, ABS 2.0 prevents skids, rear wheel lift, and sideways slips — for safer, more confident stops in any situation.
Comfort Kit – Sit back and relax.
With swept-back handlebars and a wide saddle, the Comfort Kit lets you ride in a relaxed, upright position — perfect for cruising in comfort.

With a massive 1,500 Wh of power, Riese & Müller’s DualBattery tech delivers double the range, fewer charging stops, and the freedom to take on bigger adventures — or just forget about range altogether in daily life.

Track fitness, pair with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth, and navigate without maps when linked to your phone. The Kiox 300 puts training insights and ride control right at your fingertips — all operated through the intuitive LED Remote.
Offroad Kit – Grip that goes anywhere.

Tackle rough terrain with Schwalbe Smart Sam Plus tires. A wide centre tread keeps you rolling fast, while aggressive side lugs grip hard in corners. Plus, a 3 mm puncture guard adds tough protection where it counts.
Designed for up to 5 kg per side, this sleek rack keeps your panniers secure without adding bulk. Rear and brake lights are seamlessly built in — a clean look with smart function.
Performance Kit – Built to push harder.

With powerful Tektro TRP C 2.3 brakes, premium Supernova lighting, and a suspension seatpost, the Performance Kit delivers serious control, comfort, and confidence. Brake harder, see further, and ride smoother — even under heavy loads.
Shields children from wind, rain, snow, and sun. The height adjusts with the handlebar, and the partial opening and built-in sunshade offer airflow and comfort on warmer days.
Box with Flat Cover – Secure, weatherproof storage.
This lockable cover shields up to 240 L of cargo from the elements. Made from folding polypropylene, it opens easily for quick loading and unloading.
Box with High Cover – Maximum space, full protection.
Made from durable EPP, the high, lockable cover protects up to 375 L of cargo. The low loading height keeps access quick and easy.
The durable tarpaulin keeps cargo clean and dry in any weather. It can be half or fully rolled back, letting children ride comfortably while staying protected.
Buggy – Safe, smart, and built for little passengers.

The Buggy option makes family transport easy and secure. Half-height side walls and a step let kids climb in and out with ease, while the sturdy aluminium frame and polypropylene roof offer extra protection — even in a collision. The water-repellent cover avoids PVC and includes tinted windows, roll-up sides, and a rear panel to shield against wind and rain.
Max load: 70 kg. Please check local laws before transporting children by bike.

Modular polypropylene elements let you customise the space to suit your load. Configure up to three compartments, use the flat surface, or secure Euro boxes with built-in holders and side pockets. Four eyelets allow for extra straps when carrying taller cargo.
Double Child Seat with Front Luggage Shelf – Smart space for kids and cargo.
Double Child Seat with Front Luggage Shelf – Flexible for family and cargo.

Seats two children up to age seven with five-point belts and recycled headrests. The seat folds up for extra space. The front shelf holds a crate-sized load when down, or acts as a table with foot space when up. The 47 L food-safe box fits neatly on the rack or in a shopping trolley.
Double Child Seat – Safe, flexible, and made for two.

Comfortably seats two children up to age seven, with adjustable sitting and sleeping positions. Five-point harnesses keep them secure, and the headrest — made from 100% recycled material — folds flat when not in use. Need more space? Just fold up the seat to carry larger loads.
Check local regulations before transporting children by bike.
Glove Compartment Lock – Small items, safely stored.
The glove compartment lock means small items are safely stowed away. The lock uses the same key as the battery lock and Abus frame lock and replaces the standard magnetic closure.
Three Child Seats – Room for the whole crew.
Carry up to three children (age seven or younger) with secure five-point belts and recycled headrests. The third seat folds down for cargo space, or all seats can be folded to free up even more room.
Check local regulations before transporting children by bike.
The Packster2 70 vario in detail
Frame colour chili matt*
Suspension fork Suntour Mobie 34 CGO Boost, 20"
Rear shock X-Fusion Glyde*
Headset Acros Integration X, block lock
Seatpost Satori Trident
Seatclamp JD, 40,0 mm, QR
Tires Schwalbe Big Ben Plus 55-406 Reflex
column5: Schwalbe Smart Sam Plus 57-559 Reflex*

column1: Tubes Schwalbe AV13
Rims Mach1 Trucky30 20"
Spokes Sapim Leader 2,0 mm, Inox, black
Front hub Novatec Boost Cargo Disc 32H
Rear hub Enviolo 380, 36H
Battery Akku Bosch Powertube750 Vertical
Motor Bosch Cargo Line (smart system)
Display Bosch Intuvia 100
Chain ring 55T, for Gates drive belt CDX
Chain guard Riemenschutzring
Chain Gates drive belt CDX
Pinion 24T, for Gates drive belt CDX
Saddle Selle Royal New Lookin Male Eco
column2: Selle Royal New Lookin Female Eco*

column1: Pedals VP R&
Shifter Enviolo grip shift Twist Display Pure, continuous
Handlebar Satori Horizon, 31,8 mm, 9°, B=620 mm
Stem Satori, 60 mm, +/-17°
Grips Ergon ergonomic
Brakes Tektro Auriga Comp HD-500, disc brake
Front light Supernova mini 2
Tail light Busch &
Mudguards SKS A69R
Luggage rack Riese &
Kickstand Kickstand Riese &
Lock ABUS Shield X+
RX Hardware RX Chip (für RX Services)*
Frame size [cm] universal*
Tektro Auriga Comp HD-500, disc brake

Built for families. Better for the planet.
The Packster2 70 simplifies everyday life — and it’s made from eco-friendly materials throughout.

column5: data-proportion=""true"" data-align=""none"" data-index=""0"" data-file-name=""Packster_Packster2_feature_built-for-families-better-for-the-planet.jpg"" data-file-size=""0"" data-origin="","" data-size="","" data-rotate="""" data-rotatex="""" data-rotatey="""" data-percentage=""auto,auto"">

column1: RX Connect takes your riding experience to a new level. You can completely secure your bike with the standard, integrated RX Chip and the RX Service to go along with it. Activate ConnectRide Free for one year free of charge: the RX Connect app shows the location of your bike, offers a digital motion alarm and automatically records rides with extensive riding statistics.

column5: data-proportion=""true"" data-align=""none"" data-index=""0"" data-file-name=""Packster_Packster2_feature_connected-e-bike.jpg"" data-file-size=""0"" data-origin="","" data-size="","" data-rotate="""" data-rotatex="""" data-rotatey="""" data-percentage=""auto,auto"">

column1: Effortless to ride. Easy to live with.

The Packster2 70 handles like a pro — smooth to steer, simple to park, and easy to hop on and off. Its cable steering lets you glide through tight spots, even fully loaded. Need more space? The rear carrier adds room for up to 27 kg of extra cargo.

column5: data-proportion=""true"" data-align=""none"" data-index=""0"" data-file-name=""Packster_Packster2_feature_effortless-to-ride-easy-to-live-with.jpg"" data-file-size=""0"" data-origin="","" data-size="","" data-rotate="""" data-rotatex="""" data-rotatey="""" data-percentage=""auto,auto"">

column1: The EPP transport box is fully recyclable and made with zero emissions. Optional child seats include five-point belts and side-impact protection for peace of mind. Add the buggy kit for easy access with half-height side walls — all within a tough frame that supports the weather cover and shields your passengers.

column5: data-proportion=""true"" data-align=""none"" data-index=""0"" data-file-name=""Packster_Packster2_feature_equipped-for-the-future.jpg"" data-file-size=""0"" data-origin="","" data-size="","" data-rotate="""" data-rotatex="""" data-rotatey="""" data-percentage=""auto,auto"">

column1: A powerful headlight with daytime running light and well-placed reflectors keeps you visible at all times. The optional Bosch ABS and Magura disc brakes add extra stopping power and control — preventing skids and slips, even in sudden stops.

column5: data-proportion=""true"" data-align=""none"" data-index=""0"" data-file-name=""Packster_Packster2_feature_see-clearly-stay-in-control.jpg"" data-file-size=""0"" data-origin="","" data-size="","" data-rotate="""" data-rotatex="""" data-rotatey="""" data-percentage=""auto,auto"">

column1: Additional Chain Lock with Vaude Bag – Extra security, neatly packed.

<div class=""card-description"">The 130 cm Abus chain lock pairs with the frame lock for added protection — tough 6 mm links that secure your bike to fixed objects or lock multiple bikes together. One key fits the frame, chain, and battery locks. The lock stows in a Vaude saddle bag made from 100% recycled polyester, with a roll-top design for quick, easy access.
Note: May limit saddle height on smaller frames.
Bosch eBike ABS 2.0 – Control when it counts.
Stay firmly in the saddle, even under hard braking. On asphalt or gravel, ABS 2.0 prevents skids, rear wheel lift, and sideways slips — for safer, more confident stops in any situation.
Comfort Kit – Sit back and relax.
With swept-back handlebars and a wide saddle, the Comfort Kit lets you ride in a relaxed, upright position — perfect for cruising in comfort.

With a massive 1,500 Wh of power, Riese & Müller’s DualBattery tech delivers double the range, fewer charging stops, and the freedom to take on bigger adventures — or just forget about range altogether in daily life.

Track fitness, pair with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth, and navigate without maps when linked to your phone. The Kiox 300 puts training insights and ride control right at your fingertips — all operated through the intuitive LED Remote.
Offroad Kit – Grip that goes anywhere.

Tackle rough terrain with Schwalbe Smart Sam Plus tires. A wide centre tread keeps you rolling fast, while aggressive side lugs grip hard in corners. Plus, a 3 mm puncture guard adds tough protection where it counts.
Designed for up to 5 kg per side, this sleek rack keeps your panniers secure without adding bulk. Rear and brake lights are seamlessly built in — a clean look with smart function.
Performance Kit – Built to push harder.

With powerful Tektro TRP C 2.3 brakes, premium Supernova lighting, and a suspension seatpost, the Performance Kit delivers serious control, comfort, and confidence. Brake harder, see further, and ride smoother — even under heavy loads.
Shields children from wind, rain, snow, and sun. The height adjusts with the handlebar, and the partial opening and built-in sunshade offer airflow and comfort on warmer days.
Box with Flat Cover – Secure, weatherproof storage.
This lockable cover shields up to 240 L of cargo from the elements. Made from folding polypropylene, it opens easily for quick loading and unloading.
Box with High Cover – Maximum space, full protection.
Made from durable EPP, the high, lockable cover protects up to 375 L of cargo. The low loading height keeps access quick and easy.
The durable tarpaulin keeps cargo clean and dry in any weather. It can be half or fully rolled back, letting children ride comfortably while staying protected.
Buggy – Safe, smart, and built for little passengers.

The Buggy option makes family transport easy and secure. Half-height side walls and a step let kids climb in and out with ease, while the sturdy aluminium frame and polypropylene roof offer extra protection — even in a collision. The water-repellent cover avoids PVC and includes tinted windows, roll-up sides, and a rear panel to shield against wind and rain.
Max load: 70 kg. Please check local laws before transporting children by bike.

Modular polypropylene elements let you customise the space to suit your load. Configure up to three compartments, use the flat surface, or secure Euro boxes with built-in holders and side pockets. Four eyelets allow for extra straps when carrying taller cargo.
Double Child Seat with Front Luggage Shelf – Smart space for kids and cargo.
Double Child Seat with Front Luggage Shelf – Flexible for family and cargo.

Seats two children up to age seven with five-point belts and recycled headrests. The seat folds up for extra space. The front shelf holds a crate-sized load when down, or acts as a table with foot space when up. The 47 L food-safe box fits neatly on the rack or in a shopping trolley.
Double Child Seat – Safe, flexible, and made for two.

Comfortably seats two children up to age seven, with adjustable sitting and sleeping positions. Five-point harnesses keep them secure, and the headrest — made from 100% recycled material — folds flat when not in use. Need more space? Just fold up the seat to carry larger loads.
Check local regulations before transporting children by bike.
Glove Compartment Lock – Small items, safely stored.
The glove compartment lock means small items are safely stowed away. The lock uses the same key as the battery lock and Abus frame lock and replaces the standard magnetic closure.
Three Child Seats – Room for the whole crew.
Carry up to three children (age seven or younger) with secure five-point belts and recycled headrests. The third seat folds down for cargo space, or all seats can be folded to free up even more room.
Check local regulations before transporting children by bike.
